column5: n}}, aged 73 years) was the eighth [[King of Rohan]].

{{disambig-two: Gram was the son of [[Déor]] and father of [[Helm
the King of Rohan: Helm Hammerhand]] and [[Hild]]. His reign was a time of warfare with the [[Dunlendings]], who had occupied [[Isengard]] during his father's time, and continued to raid and harass the [[Rohirrim]].<ref>{{App

{{disambig-two: [[Tolkien]] comments that the name in [[Old Norse]] has the meaning "warrior, King", which is not the case with recorded Old English (where ''[[Wiktionary:gram#Old English
the King of Rohan: gram]]'' means "fierce, grim, hostile"). However he presupposes some poetic influence of [[Northern Mannish]] upon [[Rohirric]] (similar to the influence between Old Norse and Old English), after which the name can be understood as such.<ref>{{L
